sqlMap.select: SELECT BIN_ProductID FROM Basis.BIN_Product WHERE BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND UnitCode = #unitCode#
SELECT BIN_PromotionProductID FROM Basis.BIN_PromotionProduct WHERE BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND UnitCode = #unitCode#

SELECT BIN_PrtCatPropertyID AS propId, TeminalFlag AS teminalFlag
,PropertyNameForeign AS propName
,PropertyNameChinese AS propName
,PropertyNameChinese AS propName
FROM Basis.BIN_PrtCatProperty WHERE BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND ValidFlag = '1' ORDER BY ViewSeq

SELECT A.BIN_PrtCatPropValueID AS propValId, B.BIN_PrtCatPropertyID AS propId
,A.PropValueChinese AS propValName
,A.PropValueChinese AS propValName
,A.PropValueChinese AS propValName
FROM Basis.BIN_PrtCatPropValue A JOIN Basis.BIN_PrtCatProperty B ON(B.BIN_PrtCatPropertyID = A.BIN_PrtCatPropertyID AND B.ValidFlag = '1' AND A.ValidFlag ='1') WHERE A.BIN_PrtCatPropValueID IN
#propValId[]#

SELECT BIN_PrtCatPropValueID AS propValId, PropValueChinese AS propValueCN, PropValueForeign AS propValueEN FROM Basis.BIN_PrtCatPropValue WHERE BIN_PrtCatPropertyID = #propId# AND ValidFlag ='1' ORDER BY PropValue

SELECT BIN_PrtCatPropValueID AS propValId, PropValueChinese AS propValueCN, PropValueForeign AS propValueEN,
1 AS status
CASE WHEN BindBigClass != #propValId# THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS status
FROM Basis.BIN_PrtCatPropValue WHERE BIN_PrtCatPropertyID = #propId# AND ValidFlag = '1' ORDER BY PropValue

SELECT A.BIN_PrtCatPropValueID AS propValId, A.PropValueChinese AS propValueCN, A.PropValueForeign AS propValueEN, CASE WHEN B.BIN_PrtCatPropValueID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS status FROM Basis.BIN_PrtCatPropValue A LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_PrtCatPropValue B ON(B.BindBigClass = A.BIN_PrtCatPropValueID AND B.BIN_PrtCatPropValueID = #propValId#) WHERE A.BIN_PrtCatPropertyID = #propId# AND A.ValidFlag = '1' ORDER BY A.PropValue
